Key Match Events: KL Rahul (50), Virat Kohli* (64) and SKY (30) led India to score 184 runs in 20 overs.
Hasan Mahmud took 3 wickets, while Shakib Al Hasan clicked 2 wickets.
Litton Das (60) and Najmul Hossain Shanto (21) on fire for Bangladesh.
When rain stopped, the revised target became 151 in 16 overs against 185 in 20 overs.
India's Arshdeep Singh and Pandya picked two each, and Shami clicked one.
India's fielding turned the match on.
Pre-Game Insights: After losing the toss, India lost Rohit Sharma early.
KL Rahul, Virat Kohli and SKY led India to score 184 runs in 20 overs.
Bangladesh started well but kept losing wickets following the game resumed after rains in Adelaide.
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli reacts to the win against Bangladesh.
Virender Sehwag compliments Indian bowlers on their comeback.
Mohammad Shami praises Team's character for the win.
Surya Kumar Yadav expresses gratitude over becoming world's number one batsman in T20 Cricket.
Dinesh Karthik tags the game as with an exhilarating atmosphere.
Hardik Pandya is waiting for the match against Zimbabwe.
Sachin Tendulkar congratulates Team India on its win against Bangladesh.
KL Rahul reacts after a wonderful knock against Bangladesh.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Adelaide.
The game was affected by rain and had to be paused several times.
